name: mvp-voice-agent
description: Production-ready voice agent with OpenAI Realtime API and Three.js particles

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter web dev & pnpm --filter server dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter web build

' && exit 1)
